name: secede
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to become independent of a country or area of government: There is likely to be civil war if the region tries to secede from the south.

Add to word list
Add to word list
US history to decide not to continue to be part of a larger group or organization: The American Civil War began when the South seceded from the Union.
